articles.title: Community shows support for Roslindale business owner after Pride flag torn down
articles.description:
The owner of Roslindale Gourmet Foods Market, Russ & Mimi’s, discovered her business’ Pride flag had been ripped down overnight.

The post Community shows support for Roslindale business owner after Pride flag torn down appeared first on Boston.com.
